Title: Provides procedures for cancelling race days at a pari-mutuel harness track
Summary: Requires unanimous agreement between management, the gaming commission and the horsemen's association representative before race days can be cancelled, as well as language requiring cancelled race days to be made up.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to procedures for cancelling race days at a pari-mutuel harness track
